About me

Hey, I'm Mikael Gourine.
Currently studying at Karelia University of Applied Sciences in Information Technology
as a second year student and soon moving to third year.
During my second year I've worked as a tutor to help our new students.

Outside of my studies I love to cook and spend time with my family.
My hobbies are frisbeegolf and swimming during summer, but during colder months I usually spend my time playing
video games and catching up in the cinematic world.

I would love to get more experience when it comes to the ICT-field of work since that's where my passion is.
During my childhood my interest started at computers and how they were built but after further experience surrounding computers, operating systems and their hardware, my interest shifted towards the application and the design behind them, which lead me to where I am now.
